overall_assessment.status: Firmly established at Level 1.0, trending toward Level 2.0
strengths: Explore world through sensory input: Learn physical cause-effect through multi-modal sensory experience
Reflect on lessons and improve: Self-evaluation and learning behavior modification
Social scenes with emotional nuance: Cooperation, fairness, and complex social dynamics
Integrate multiple sensory modalities: Form coherent concepts from diverse sensory inputs
Retain and reflect on experience: Long-term memory with experiential learning
development_opportunities: Self-Referential Continuity: 'I remember doing this yesterday. I want to do better today.'
Internal Goal Generation: Form goals from internal drives, not just external prompts
Value System Formation: Show preferences based on experience/emotion, distinguish good/bad
Narrative Identity Construction: 'I used to be scared of fire. Now I'm careful with it.'
